import React, { Component } from 'react' import axios from 'axios'; export class Pembeli extends Component { constructor(props){ super(props) this.state = { users : [], modalIsOpen : false, email : '', password : '', saldo : '', id_pembeli : 0 } this.openModal = this.openModal.bind(this); this.handleSubmit = this.handleSubmit.bind(this); // this.handleUpdate = this.handleUpdate.bind(this); this.handleDelete = this.handleDelete.bind(this); this.handleChangeId = this.handleChangeId.bind(this); this.handleChangeEmail = this.handleChangeId.bind(this); this.handleChangePassword = this.handleChangePassword.bind(this); this.handleChangeSaldo = this.handleChangeSaldo.bind(this); } handleChangeId(event){ this.setState({id_pembeli: event.target.value}); } handleChangeEmail(event) { this.setState({email: event.target.value}); } handleChangePassword(event) { this.setState({password: event.target.value}); } handleChangeSaldo(event) { this.setState({saldo: event.target.value}); } openModal(pembeli){ // alert('Test'); this.setState({ modalIsOpen : true, email : pembeli.email, password : pembeli.password, saldo : pembeli.saldo, id_pembeli : pembeli.id_pembeli }); } handleSubmit = event => { event.preventDefault(); const obj = { id_pembeli : this.state.id_pembeli, email : this.state.email, password : this.state.password, saldo : this.state.saldo } axios.post('http://localhost:5000/api/v1/pembeli/add', obj) .then(res => { console.log(res.data); }).catch(err => { console.log('Something Error ',err); }); } handleUpdate = event => { event.preventDefault(); const obj = { id_pembeli : this.state.id_pembeli, email : this.state.email, password : this.state.password, saldo : this.state.saldo } axios.post(`http://localhost:5000/api/v1/pembeli/edit`,obj) .then(res => { console.log(res.data); }).catch(err => { console.log('Something Error ', err); }); } handleDelete = event => { event.preventDefault(); axios.delete(`http://localhost:5000/api/v1/pembeli/del/${this.state.id_pembeli}`) .then(res => { console.log(res.data); }).catch(err => { console.log('Something Error ',err); }); } componentDidMount(){ axios.get('http://localhost:5000/api/v1/pembeli') .then(res => { const users = res.data; this.setState({users}); }).catch(err => { console.log('Somthing Error !', err); }); } render() { return (
